item.title: Configuring Postfix with Gmail
item.description: This is sub-part of my series on renovating my homelabs to ring in the roaring ‘20s. I previously wrote about setting up ZFS and, more importantly, ZED, the ZFS Event Daemon. ZED will notify me about ZFS events (like the completion of a daily scrub) via email - but we need to configure a relay so those emails make it off of my server and in to my inbox.
